subject: Caution: Vulnerability on your site(s)!
preview: Hello, This is Aman from the Support team at BlogVault. We've identified critical vulnerabilities on your website(s) that require immediate attention to ensure the security and integrity of your site(

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli marked as Closed
Workflow **Vulnerability assigned to Manuel** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hello,

This is Aman from the Support team at BlogVault.

We've identified critical vulnerabilities on your website(s) that require immediate attention to ensure the security and integrity of your site(s).

We've included a subset of sites with vulnerabilities. Please access the BlogVault dashboard to review complete list of:
  • Vulnerable Plugins
  • Vulnerable Themes
  • Vulnerable Wordpress Core
